text: Bachia oxyrhina is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is endemic to Brazil. ==References== Category:Bachia Category:Reptiles of Brazil Category:Endemic fauna of Brazil Category:Reptiles described in 2008 Category:Taxa named by Miguel Trefaut Rodrigues Category:Taxa named by Augustín Camacho Guerrero Category:Taxa named by Pedro M. Ghellere Category:Taxa named by Tami Mott Category:Taxa named by Cristiano Nogueira
title: Bachia oxyrhina
